translations.source: 上海市政工程设计研究(集团)有限公司
translations.target: Shanghai Municipal Engineering Design & Research Institute (Group) Co., Ltd.

translations.source: 上海市政工程设计研究(集团)有限公司
translations.target: Shanghai Municipal Engineering Design & Research Institute (Group) Co., Ltd.

translations.source: 上海华城工程建设管理有限公司
translations.target: Shanghai Huacheng Engineering Construction Management Co., Ltd.

translations.source: 手续，包括项目概算、建设用地、规划报批、图纸审查、消防审核开工报告、等，各项手续齐全，确保工程顺利进行。
translations.target: Procedures, including the project cost estimate, construction land use, planning approvals, drawing review, fire protection review, commencement report, etc., were all completed to ensure smooth project implementation.

translations.source: 施工过程中对工程质量、进度、投资、安全以及外部协调等工作进行科学管理，顺利保证了工程目标实现。
translations.target: During construction, scientific management was implemented for project quality, schedule, investment, safety, and external coordination, ensuring the successful achievement of project objectives.

translations.source: 项目建设单位主体资格、管理人员资质满足项目质量管理要求。建设单位依法进行了工程发包，通过公开招标等法定程序选定参建单位并签定了有效的承包合同。
translations.target: The project owner's legal entity qualifications and the credentials of its management personnel met the requirements for project quality management. The owner awarded the works in accordance with law, selected participating contractors through statutory procedures such as public bidding, and executed valid construction contracts.

translations.source: 及时办理了消防、施工图审核、质量和安全监督、施工许可等各项建设行政管理手续。施工中对各参建单位质量保证体系和质量行为进行了有效监控和协调，按规定主持了施工图会审、特殊施工方案专家评审，第一次工地会议、分部工程质量验收等相关工作，核查并签署了相关质量保证资料。按照规定程序进行了设计变更、施工洽商的编制、审核、会签和实施。工程一直处于受控状态，未发生安全、质量事故，圆满完成建设任务。
translations.target: All administrative procedures were handled in a timely manner, including fire protection, construction drawing review, quality and safety supervision, and construction permits. During construction, the quality assurance systems and quality practices of all participating parties were effectively monitored and coordinated. In accordance with regulations, the construction drawing review meeting, expert review of special construction schemes, the first site meeting, and quality acceptance of sub-divisional works were chaired as required, and the relevant quality assurance documents were verified and signed. Design changes and construction technical clarifications were prepared, reviewed, jointly signed, and implemented in accordance with the prescribed procedures. The project remained under control throughout, with no safety or quality incidents, and the construction tasks were successfully completed.

translations.source: 2025年6月24日，对泰和污水处理厂扩建工程THK2.2标（自控设备采购及安装调试）进行了竣工验收。验收组通过实地检查以及参建各方提供的相关技术资料的查看，一致认为已经完成合同范围内的工程量，工程质量符合国家相关标准及规范，质保资料基本齐全、未发生安全质量事故，工程质量满足设计要求，验收组同意通过验收。
translations.target: On June 24, 2025, completion acceptance was carried out for the Taihe Wastewater Treatment Plant Expansion Project, Contract THK2.2 (procurement, installation, and commissioning of automation and control equipment). Based on on-site inspection and review of relevant technical documents provided by all parties, the acceptance committee unanimously confirmed that the contracted scope of work had been completed; the project quality complies with applicable national standards and specifications; quality assurance documents are basically complete; no safety or quality incidents occurred; and the project quality meets the design requirements. The committee agreed to pass the acceptance.

translations.source: 该工程已完成合同约定的各项内容，工程质量符合国家和地方有关标准及设计要求。同意本次竣工验收。
translations.target: The project has completed all items as stipulated in the contract, and its quality complies with relevant national and local standards as well as the design requirements. This completion acceptance is approved.
